name.value: C-CDA on FHIR History and Physical

description.value:
A History and Physical (H&P) note is a medical report that documents the current and past conditions of the patient. It contains essential information that helps determine an individual's health status.
The first portion of the report is a current collection of organized information unique to an individual. This is typically supplied by the patient or the caregiver, concerning the current medical problem or the reason for the patient encounter. This information is followed by a description of any past or ongoing medical issues, including current medications and allergies. Information is also obtained about the patient's lifestyle, habits, and diseases among family members. The next portion of the report contains information obtained by physically examining the patient and gathering diagnostic information in the form of laboratory tests, imaging, or other diagnostic procedures.
The report ends with the clinician's assessment of the patient's situation and the intended plan to address those issues.
A History and Physical Examination is required upon hospital admission as well as before operative procedures. An initial evaluation in an ambulatory setting is often documented in the form of an H&P note.

definition.value: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] type, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HPDocumentType http://hl7.org/fhir/ccda/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.22 DYNAMIC (CONF:2219-1820).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] section (CONF:2219-1759) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1739) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1760).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="48765-2" Allergies and Adverse Reactions (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1761).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1762).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core AllergyIntolerance Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-allergyintolerance) (CONF:2219-2453). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] FamilyMemberHistory (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FamilyMemberHistory) (CONF:2219-2454). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2455). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core MedicationStatement Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-medicationstatement) (CONF:2219-2457). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core SmokingStatus Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-smokingstatus) (CONF:2219-2461). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core VitalSigns Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-vitalsigns) (CONF:2219-2462). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Immunization Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-immunization) (CONF:2219-2456). SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Condition Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-condition) (CONF:2219-2458). MAY contain zero or more [0..*] U.S. Core Procedure Profile (identifier: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-procedure) (CONF:2219-2459).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1744) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1775).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10157-6" History of Family Member Diseases (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1776).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1777).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1745) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1778).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10210-3" Physical Findings of General Status (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1779).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1780).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1746) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1781).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="11348-0" History of Past Illness (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1782).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1783).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1749) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1790).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code="10160-0" History of Medication Use (CodeSystem: LOINC urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:2219-1791).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1792).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1750) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1793).

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:2219-1795).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section (CONF:2219-1755) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:2219-1808).
